item.description: The monthly dinner meetings are primarily non-mandatory networking events. Although we talk business updates for half an hour and occasionally play evidence clips, these events are for discussion, event/investigation planning, asking questions, telling your own stories, etc. They're so we can all have a little unpressured time as a group. The private back room also has a projector on the ceiling that can be used for evidence clips. As always, Asia has a decent buffet going til 8:00 - $12 per person - or choose something from their most excellent menu. Join us!
item.how_to_find_us: We usually sit at a table in the back private room.
item.name: The Seacoast Paranormal Research Group Monthly Meetup
